item.title: Old Mutual 因 "非凡 "的新业务增长而利润大增
item.description: Old Mutual Ltd.称，新业务的 "超常增长 "推动非洲资产规模最大的保险公司去年的利润增长了 45%。【原文：Old Mutual Ltd. said “exceptional growth” in new business drove profit at Africa’s biggest insurer by assets as much as 45% higher last year.】

item.title: 经过罕见的竞购战，第一生命以 20 亿美元收购 Benefit One
item.description: 日本第一生命控股公司（Dai-ichi Life Holdings Inc.【原文：Japan’s Dai-ichi Life Holdings Inc. and Benefit One Inc. approved a $2 billion transaction that will see the nation’s largest listed life insurer take over the corporate services company following a rare bidding contest.】

item.title: 路透社报道：中国李宁考虑将体育用品公司私有化
item.description: 路透社援引未具名人士的话报道称，从体操运动员转行的中国企业家李宁正在考虑将其同名运动装品牌从香港股市私有化。【原文：Chinese gymnast-turned entrepreneur Li Ning is considering taking his eponymous sportswear brand private from the Hong Hong stock market, Reuters reported, citing people it didn’t identify.】

item.title: 消息人士称，日本央行考虑 3 月加息，但结果尚不确定
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，日本央行官员正逐步接近加息，并将在下周的政策会议上决定是否在本月加息，目前结果尚不明朗。【原文：Bank of Japan officials are edging closer to raising interest rates and will decide whether to move this month at next week’s policy meeting, with the outcome currently too close to call, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 调查显示：英国购房者加快计划以应对价格上涨
item.description: 一项调查显示，近一半的英国购房者将在今年加快购房计划，许多人担心房价会再次攀升。【原文：Almost half of UK house hunters are set to accelerate their purchase plans this year, with many fearing that prices are about to climb again, according to a survey.】

item.title: 全球航空机构称将空难作为刑事犯罪重点是 "错误的
item.description: 航空业全球机构的负责人表示，将空难定为刑事犯罪是 "绝对错误的"— 这是对美国司法部调查波音公司围绕阿拉斯加航空公司空中门塞爆炸事件的行为的斥责。【原文：The head of the airline industry’s global body says the criminalization of air accidents is “absolutely wrong” — a rebuke to the Department of Justice’s probe of Boeing Co.’s conduct around the mid-air Alaska Airlines door plug blowout.】

item.title: 英伟达与思科— 用任何其他标准衡量都是泡沫
item.description:
从不同的角度来衡量，你就会明白为什么其中一个仍在攀升，而另一个却已不再攀升。这将归结为可持续性。【原文：

Measured different ways, you can see why one is still climbing, where by this point the other wasn’t. It will come down to sustainability.

item.title: 地产精英前往戛纳，却无太多值得庆祝之处
item.description: 随着房地产界的精英们齐聚戛纳，参加欧洲最大的年度房地产盛会，越来越多的知名人士缺席。【原文：As real estate’s great and good gather in Cannes for Europe’s biggest annual property event, there are a growing number of notable absences.】

item.title: 无人机袭击后卢克石油公司俄罗斯炼油厂装置起火
item.description: 俄罗斯下诺夫哥罗德州州长格列布-尼基京（Gleb Nikitin）在 Telegram 上发帖称，俄罗斯下诺夫哥罗德州的一家炼油厂在一夜之间遭到无人机袭击后起火，但没有说明袭击的具体性质。【原文：A unit of a refinery in Russia’s Nizhny Novgorod region is on fire after an overnight drone attack, regional Governor Gleb Nikitin said in a Telegram post, without specifying the exact nature of the hit.】

item.title: 中国《国家安全法》如何改变香港
item.description: 2019 年，香港爆发了支持民主的抗议活动，此后中国大陆加强了对香港的控制，对这个前英国殖民地实施了广泛的国家安全法。此后，包括前媒体大亨黎智英（Jimmy Lai）在内的数十名反对派人士被监禁。新闻机构被关闭，教师受到处分。习近平主席已明确表示他的目标：香港应掌握在 "爱国者 "手中。这让人们对香港能否保持 "高度自治 "产生了很大的怀疑。【原文：After pro-democracy protests rocked Hong Kong in 2019, mainland China tightened its grip by imposing a broad national security law on the former British colony. Since then, dozens of opposition figures — including former media tycoon Jimmy Lai — have been jailed. News outlets have been shut and teachers disciplined. President Xi Jinping has made his aim clear: Hong Kong should be in the hands of “patriots.” That’s cast a lot of doubt on whether the city can maintain the “high degree of autonomy”】

item.title: 加拿大国家银行权衡柬埔寨分行方案
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，加拿大国家银行正在探索包括出售 ABA 银行在内的各种方案，该银行的交易价值可能超过 20 亿美元。【原文：National Bank of Canada is exploring options including a sale of ABA Bank, which could be valued at more than $2 billion in a deal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 彭博经济学家称美国 CPI 不会促使美联储降息
item.description: 据彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）报道，将于周二公布的美国消费者物价月度报告不会让美联储官员相信开始降息是安全的。【原文：A monthly report on US consumer prices due Tuesday won’t convince Federal Reserve officials it’s safe to begin lowering interest rates, according to Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 代币价格飙升，比特币挖矿日收入创纪录
item.description: 比特币矿工的收入上周创下历史新高，因为这种最大的加密货币的价格继续在创纪录水平附近交易。【原文：Bitcoin miner earnings hit all-time highs last week as the price for the largest cryptocurrency continues to trade around record levels.】

item.title: 戴蒙称赞人工智能 "难以置信"，称其为对话的核心
item.description: 2023年12月6日星期三，美国华盛顿，摩根大通公司董事长兼首席执行官杰米-戴蒙在参议院银行、住房和城市事务委员会听证会上发言。美国最大银行的掌门人将利用这次听证会来为他们认为将损害经济的规则提案淡化辩护。摄影师：Ting Shen/Bloomberg【原文：Jamie Dimon, chairman and chief executive officer of JPMorgan Chase & Co., speaks during a Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs Committee hearing in Washington, DC, US, on Wednesday, Dec. 6, 2023. The heads of the biggest US banks will use the hearing to make their case for watering down rule proposals they argue will harm the economy. Photographer: Ting Shen/Bloomberg】

item.title: Jollibee 瞄准中国市场指数级增长，实现利润三倍增长
item.description: 菲律宾最大的餐馆运营商 Jollibee Foods Corp. 首席执行官 Ernesto Tanmantiong 表示，公司计划在国际上拓展品牌，并在中国实现 "指数式增长"，目标是在五年内将净收入增加两倍。【原文：Jollibee Foods Corp., the Philippines’ largest restaurant operator, plans to expand its brand internationally and “exponentially grow” in China as it aims to triple its net income in five years, according to CEO Ernesto Tanmantiong.】

item.title: 外国基金加入中国牛市，重新爱上 CATL
item.description: 海外投资者周一加入了对当代安培瑞斯科技股份有限公司（Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.周一，由于对中国遭受重创的可再生能源股的热情重燃，该公司股价大涨超过 14%。【原文：Overseas investors joined the buying frenzy for Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Monday, driving a more than 14% surge in its shares on rekindled excitement over China’s battered renewable stocks.】

item.title: 美国大选年汽油价格飙升增加通胀风险
item.description: 世界主要贸易路线的中断、炼油厂的关闭和需求的恢复正在合力推高全球燃料价格，并在美国总统大选前夕使预测变得困难，而通货膨胀将是美国总统大选的一个关键问题。【原文：Disruptions on the world’s major trade routes, refinery closures and resurgent demand are conspiring to push up global fuel prices and make forecasts difficult in the run-up to a US presidential election in which inflation will be a key issue.】

item.title: 中国瓶装水巨头农夫山泉因抵制呼声而下跌
item.description: 中国饮料巨头农夫山泉股份有限公司（Nongfu Spring Co., Ltd.）是最新一个受到大陆民族主义网络大军抨击的大品牌，凸显了国内企业在日益爱国的环境中面临的挑战。【原文：Chinese beverage giant Nongfu Spring Co. is the latest major brand to come under fire from the mainland’s online army of nationalist citizens, underscoring challenges for domestic firms navigating an increasingly patriotic environment.】

item.title: 印度今年最大的股票赢家没有分析师报道
item.description: 塔塔集团（Tata Group）旗下一家没有分析师评级、机构投资者持股比例极低的投资公司成为今年印度表现最好的股票，这是当地股票狂热的最新体现。【原文：An investment firm of conglomerate Tata Group with no analyst rating and minuscule ownership by institutional investors has become the top-performing Indian stock this year, the latest showcase of the frenzy in local equities.】

item.title: 通胀降温，阿根廷出人意料地将利率降至 80
item.description: 阿根廷央行出人意料地将基准利率从 100%下调至 80%，因为决策者认为月度通胀降温，同时比索兑美元在平行市场上继续走强。【原文：Argentina’s central bank unexpectedly cut its benchmark interest rate to 80% from 100% as policymakers see monthly inflation cooling while the peso continues to strengthen against the US dollar in parallel markets.】

item.title: KKR 认为现在是进军亚洲信贷市场的好时机
item.description: KKR & Co.称，亚洲信贷市场提供了一些最佳投资机会，因为该地区融资需求强劲，资产价值被低估，发行人质量高。【原文：Asia’s credit markets offer some of the best investment opportunities because of strong demand for financing, undervalued assets and high-quality issuers in the region, according to KKR & Co.】

item.title: 日本电产和 KPS 据称将争夺西门子价值 30 亿欧元的 Innomotics 公司
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，日本电产株式会社和私募股权公司KPS Capital Partners正在竞相收购西门子公司的Innomotics大型电机业务。【原文：Japan’s Nidec Corp. and private equity firm KPS Capital Partners are competing to acquire Siemens AG’s Innomotics large motors business, which could fetch about €3 billion ($3.3 billion) in a sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Blackwells 就 ValueAct 养老金管理角色质询迪士尼
item.description: Blackwells Capital 认为，华特迪士尼公司本应披露 ValueAct Capital Management 正在管理其部分养老基金资产，这激起了两家激进投资公司之间的紧张关系，因为它们在这家娱乐巨头身上追求不同的议程。【原文：Blackwells Capital contends that Walt Disney Co. should have disclosed that ValueAct Capital Management was managing some of its pension fund assets, stirring tensions between the two activist investment firms as they pursue different agendas at the entertainment giant.】

item.title: 中国股票重回全球投资组合的底部赌注
item.description: 在经历了过去一年的多次 "假曙光 "之后，一些投资者看到了中国股市此次反弹可能与众不同的证据。【原文：After multiple false dawns over the past year, some investors are seeing evidence that this rebound in Chinese stocks may be different.】

item.title: 印度终于拥抱贸易协议，企业将目光投向中国
item.description: 高塔姆-奈尔（Gautam Nair）正准备在他位于古鲁格拉姆（Gurugram）的服装厂加大生产力度，随着印度寻求与世界其他国家签订更多的自由贸易协定，他寄希望于来自马莎百货（Marks & Spencer）和 Next 等品牌的订单激增。【原文：Gautam Nair is preparing to ramp up production at his clothing factory in Gurugram, betting on a surge of orders from brands like Marks & Spencer and Next as India pursues more free trade pacts with the rest of the world.】

item.title: 欧佩克（OPEC）月度报告和美国通胀数据公布前，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 在一系列市场报告和美国通胀数据可能为油价指明方向之前，油价在连续三天下跌后企稳。【原文：Oil steadied after a three-day drop ahead of a series of market reports and US inflation data that may provide direction for prices.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行行长亨特称家庭目前 "明显陷入困境
item.description: 储备银行（Reserve Bank）行长助理莎拉-亨特（Sarah Hunter）在董事会召开会议决定利率的一周前表示，澳大利亚家庭目前 "显然在挣扎"，因为他们面临着以通货膨胀为首的一系列不利因素。【原文：Australian households are “clearly struggling” at present as they confront a number of headwinds, led by inflation, Reserve Bank Assistant Governor Sarah Hunter said a week before the board meets to decide on interest rates.】

item.title: 美国通胀数据迫在眉睫，亚洲股市涨跌不一：市场综述
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市开盘涨跌不一，此前华尔街交投谨慎，通胀数据将影响美联储转向宽松货币政策的时机。【原文：Asian stocks were poised for mixed openings on Tuesday after cautious trading on Wall Street ahead of inflation data that’s set to influence the timing of the Federal Reserve’s pivot to monetary easing.】

item.title: 波兰庆祝 80 亿美元美元债券的历史性销售
item.description: 波兰财政部长安杰伊-多曼斯基（Andrzej Domanski）表示，这是波兰有史以来最大的一次美元债券发行。【原文：Poland sold $8 billion in dollar-denominated bonds in what Finance Minister Andrzej Domanski said was the country’s biggest ever debt issue in the US currency.】
